Insert urinary catheter.sentence: The nurse gathers all necessary tools for the catheter insertion.
Insert urinary catheter.subject: The nurse
Insert urinary catheter.tools: urinary catheter, lubricant, gloves, antiseptic wipes, drainage bag

Insert urinary catheter.sentence: The nurse explains the procedure to the patient to ensure understanding and consent.
Insert urinary catheter.subject: The nurse

Insert urinary catheter.sentence: The nurse positions the patient appropriately to facilitate catheter insertion.
Insert urinary catheter.subject: The nurse

Insert urinary catheter.sentence: The nurse dons gloves and cleans the urinary meatus with antiseptic wipes.
Insert urinary catheter.subject: The nurse

Insert urinary catheter.sentence: The nurse gently inserts the urinary catheter into the bladder and secures it in place.
Insert urinary catheter.subject: The nurse
